content:
FHIR-34768 Documentation Discrepancy for FHIR HumanName
Status: Deferred, Type: Technical Correction

:point_up: Can someone re-open that ticket? When I try to, it complains about not having a linked page or artifact. (The ticket was first reported on the wrong Jira project and closed there, then moved to the FHIR project)
I was the initial reporter for this ticket, but I also don't seem to have permissions to comment on or reopen the ticket.
Done. There were a bunch of fields that needed to be populated due to it having been created and closed on the wrong project. Only admins have the power to do that.
Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie. cc @Johanan Idicula
